mapper.select: select ot.ol_order_num onum, ol_final_price osum, pt.p_name p_name, ol_date odate, ol_status ostatus from orderlist_tb ot left join product_tb pt on ot.p_num=pt.p_num where ol_order_num=#{order_num}

select * from (select rt_num, ol_order_num, rt_receipt_date, rt_sort, rt_status, p_name, m_id from return_tb union select rf_num, ol_order_num, rf_receipt_date, rf_sort, rf_status, p_name, m_id from refund_tb) where ol_order_num=#{order_num}
select count(*) from orderlist_tb where ol_order_num=#{orderListDto.ol_order_num} and ol_orderer_id=#{orderListDto.ol_orderer_id}

select count(*) from (select rt_num, ol_order_num, rt_receipt_date, rt_sort, rt_status, p_name, m_id from return_tb union select rf_num, ol_order_num, rf_receipt_date, rf_sort, rf_status, p_name, m_id from refund_tb) where ol_order_num=#{orderListDto.ol_order_num}
